episodes.title: The Non-Prophets, Episode 24.47.3 featuring Eli, Common Sense Cult, Trust But Verify
episodes.description:
**The Barna Group reveals that Gen Z women are struggling deeply with their faith, citing isolation, anxiety, and a distrust of religious institutions. We examine why organized religion is failing young women and driving them towards secular communities and skepticism. This demographic shift underscores the critical role of intersectional issues ignored by rigid, traditional doctrines.**

News Source:
Gen Z Women Struggling in Faith
By Unknown for Barna
🔗 https://www.barna.com/trends/gen-z-women-struggling-in-faith/

The Non-Prophets, Episode 24.47.3 featuring Eli, Common Sense Cult, and Trust But Verify

Gen Z Women: The Faith Crisis 💔
Churches Fail Young Women
Secularism Wins Gen Z
Why Gen Z Hates Organized Religion
Anxiety, Isolation, and Deconstruction
Barna Group Confirms Religious Decline
Religious Institutions vs. Intersectionality
Stop Blaming Young People for Leaving
The Struggle for Modern Faith
Feminism and Evangelicalism Conflict
The Rise of the Nones

#god #jesus #catholic #Christian #atheist #humanist #secular #religion #bible #church #religion #women #womenempowerment #womensrights #tradwives #tradwife

WHAT IS THE NON-PROPHETS?

The Non-Prophets is a internet show airing at 06:00pm Central time Monday, Wednesday, Friday, and Saturday each week. Where we navigate through current events, providing a secular viewpoint that adds depth to the unfolding narrative.

The Atheist Community of Austin is organized as a nonprofit educational corporation to develop and support the atheist community, to provide opportunities for socializing and friendship, to promote secular viewpoints, to encourage positive atheist culture, to defend the first amendment principle of state-church separation, to oppose discrimination against atheists and to work with other organizations in pursuit of common goals.

We define atheism as the lack of belief in gods. This definition also encompasses what most people call agnosticism.

episodes.title: The Non-Prophets, Episode 24.47.1 featuring Eli, Common Sense Cult, Trust But Verify
episodes.description:
The Vatican, desperate to stay relevant amidst widespread secularism, held a "surprising assembly" with prominent Hollywood figures. We dissect this obvious propaganda push and coercion tactic designed to influence content and coerce creative professionals into supporting faith-driven messaging. This bizarre meeting reveals the hypocrisy of religious leaders who claim morality is objectively determined by God's will while simultaneously asking where the world gets its values.

News Source:
Pope Leo, Hollywood actors, Vatican
By Maria Manzos for Deseret News
November 13th, 2025
🔗 https://www.deseret.com/faith/2025/11/13/pope-leo-hollywood-actors-vatican/

The Non-Prophets, Episode 24.47.1 featuring Eli, Common Sense Cult, and Trust But Verify

Pope Leo’s Hollywood Propaganda Push 🎬
Vatican Grasping at Secular Straws 🤦
Is God's Morality Made in Hollywood? ❓
Coercing Actors to Create Religious Content 💰
The Pope Needs a Boycott List ASAP 🚫
Hollywood Stars Meet the Vatican: A Manipulation Tactic 🎭
The Hypocrisy of Objective Morality 🤥
The Catholic Church’s Desperate Attempt to Stay Cool 😎
Hollywood and the Pope: Is It Evangelism? 🙏
When the Vatican Talks Out of Both Sides of Its Mouth 🗣️
Religious Coercion in the Entertainment Industry 📺
The Pope's Bizarre A-List Assembly ✨
Stop Funding Faith-Driven Messaging 🛑
Celebrity Worship at the Vatican? 🕌
Morality Check: Where DO You Get Your Values? 🤔

episodes.title: FBI Takes down Religious Forced Labor Ring
episodes.description: This week, we unpack a truly divine scam where self-proclaimed holy rollers stand accused of running a $50M forced labor ring, complete with luxury cars and coerced "donations." It’s another classic tale of religious leaders enriching themselves while their flock endures psychological abuse, starvation, and threats of eternal damnation—because nothing says "love thy neighbor" like a Bentley and a BITE model. We dissect how easily faith can be twisted into a tool for control, exposing the thin veil between spiritual guidance and outright cult behavior. This segment peels back the layers of hypocrisy, reminding us that sometimes, the holiest places harbor the most unholy acts. When religion becomes a weapon for exploitation, who needs actual devils? News Source: FBI raid in Houston tied to $50M forced labor case against religious leaders By Jaime E. Galvan, Deevon Rahming, and Orko Manna for KHOU 11 August 27th 2025 🔗 https://www.khou.com/article/news/crime/jmmi-houston-fbi-raid-interstate-45-north-freeway/285-c9032542-2f6c-40a1-b5e1-2b6e33629008?utm_medium=social&utm_source=facebook_KHOU_11_News The Non-Prophets, Episode 24.37 1-3 featuring Scott Dickie, Jonathan Roudabush, and Flabbergasted Holy Hustle: $50M Cult Exposed 💰 Faith-Based Forced Labor Ring Busted ⛓️ BITE Model Breakdown: Cult or Church? 🤔 Praise the Lord, Pass the Bentley 🙏 Religious Leaders' Luxury Scam 💸 When Pastors Become Predators 🚨 Unmasking a Spiritual Crime Syndicate 🎭 The Dark Side of Divine Donations 😈 From Pulpit to Prison: A Cult's Fall 🏛️ Exposed: The Hypocrisy of "Holy" Leaders 🤬 Not So Divine: Forced Labor in Faith 🚫 Cult Tactics 101: The BITE Model in Action 🧠 Beyond Belief: Religious Exploitation Exposed 😡 God's Work or Grand Theft? ⚖️ This "Ministry" Is a Mafia 🔫 Become a supporter of this podcast: https://www.spreaker.com/podcast/the-non-prophets--3254964/support .
